name: Endless Nightmares - The Game
description:
The nightmare starts when "John Doe" an excellent computer programmer and graphic designer kills his wife and daughter in an accident one year ago. Now every day he has a nightmare, but this time it's different. This time the nightmare seems more realistic, too real for him!. Remember, you are not alone... There is a monster looking for you! Your task is to survive this nightmare and to not be caught by this entity!

Read all notes for advice from the past.

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement

E - Grab Items or Open/Close Doors

F - Flashlight

ESC - Pause

INSTRUCTION:

1. You need a key to open outside the door!

2. Read notes on the walls

3. Office is upstairs

4. In the forest, you only find notes and monster

5. The dungeon is a way to end the game!

6. The flashlight is in the living room
